appDescription.description: A description of the extension displayed in the web store.
appDescription.message: Manages DevTools with Node V8 Inspector (node --inspect) Debugging Workflow

appName.description: The title of the extension displayed in the web store.

autoStepping.description: Popup page description for runaway tabs popup message
autoStepping.message: Will auto resume stepping when --inspect-brk flag is used.

brakeCODEDashboardLoginRequired.message: You must be logged into BrakeCODE Dashboard to open remote debugging sessions.

brakeCODELoginRequired.description: Options BrakeCODE API Key message when user is not logged into BrakeCODE.

brakecodeAuthRequired.description: Popup error when authentication is required for remote debugging.

devtoolsPanelAbout.message: NiM manages unlimited local and remote debugging sessions at the DevTools protocol layer and makes secure collaboration easy.

devtoolsPanelTitle.description: Title shown on the chrome devtools panel.

errMsg3.message: Error while trying to auto close

errMsg4.message: Connection to DevTools host was aborted.  Check your host and port.

errMsg8.description: Storage key $key$ in namespace $namespace$ changed.  Old value was $oldvalue$, new value is $newvalue$

githubNodejsNodeIssues24085.message: This button is disabled because currently, Node has no facility to support more than a single programmatically started debugging session. This means that a debugging session has already been started on the default port 9229. A proposed change to the default behavior of Node would remove this limitation. Read more about the issue here: https://github.com/nodejs/node/issues/24085

noNotifications.description: Message to display when there are no notifications.

openInspectorNewWindow.description: Open Inspector in a new window.

optionsCustomDevToolsURL.description: Lable for custom DevTools settings modal input

optionsDiagnosticReports.description: Options page label for Node.js Diagnostic Reports.

optionsNiMSVSCode.description: Options page label for VSCode Integration.

optionsRealtimeCollaboration.description: Options page label for Real-time Collaboration Setting.

optionsSchemeFix.description: Options page label for optionsSchemeFix setting.

optionsWindowStateMaximized.description: Options page label for windowStateMaximized setting.

runawayTabs.message: Runaway tabs were detected and Auto mode was disabled.  If the condition persists, please file a bug report.
